original_text: For thus saith the Lord of hosts; After the glory hath he sent me unto the nations which spoiled you: for he that toucheth you toucheth the apple of his eye.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시되 영광을 위하여 나를 너희를 노략한 여러 나라로 보내셨나니 너희를 범하는 자는 그의 눈동자를 범하는 것이라

sentences.original_text: For thus saith the Lord of hosts
After the glory hath he sent me
unto the nations which spoiled you
toucheth the apple of his eye
